name: German Apartment Simulator - DEMO
description:
As the title may suggest, this game is a comedy based game taking place in a German apartment. While mostly focusing on comedy, the game also features many moments of an uneasy and mysterious atmosphere as the player experiences the over exaggerated version of everyday life of a low-class German citizen.

 The main objective of the game is to survive and live through the inflation that is hitting Germany by the time of the Game’s development. Be sure to make the right decisions or else you will die, whether it be in a funny or disturbing way. While being a comedy based game, the developer places great effort in making a funny and entertaining game while sharing how inflation is affecting the day to day life of the average German citizen. Will you play the game, hoping to survive or will you find every possible way to die? 

THIS IS A DEMO!

German Apartment Simulator is still in development and this is the demo of the game! If you are interested in seeing updates and the full release please make sure to check out our twitter. The full release will be uploaded to this page along with its translations!
